author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Civitas Solutions Reports Q2 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.37
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Civitas Solutions Inc:
* CIVITAS SOLUTIONS REPORTS FISCAL 2018 SECOND QUARTER FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q2 LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q2 REVENUE $392.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $396.2 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $1.58 BILLION TO $1.61 BILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.11 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FOR FISCAL 2018, CO IS NARROWING ITS NET REVENUE GUIDANCE RANGE AND REDUCING TOP-END OF ITS ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE RANGE
* EXPECTS FISCAL 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IN RANGE OF $168 MILLION TO $171 MILLION
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.60 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
